alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 11:54AM MDT until March 15 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Higher amounts of 8 to 10 inches over White Bird Grade. For low elevations: snow will mix with rain this evening then transition over to all snow tonight into Wednesday morning. The risk for a freeze up of surfaces will create difficult travel Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, Greer Grade, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
